titles.title: Calling on the President and the American people to renew their commitment to the fundamental principles which guided the Founders of this Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 10/28/1999--Introduced. Urges the President to call on the American people to remember the godly principles of our Founding Fathers. Calls on every official to lead our citizens in the revitalization of these principles. Encourages every public school or institution to display and teach them as a matter of history and as a matter of law.Requests and encourages all citizens to rediscover these principles and renew commitment to them.
